definition: to appear (in a show etc)/an appearance (on stage etc)

to go out/to come out/to occur/to produce/to go beyond/to rise/to put forth/to happen/(used after a verb to indicate an outward direction or a positive result)/classifier for dramas, plays, operas etc
to develop/to evolve/to practice/to perform/to play/to act

sentences.english: Chico also was known for performing what was called the comedy of the absurd.
sentences.chinese: Chico也因爲出演被叫做荒誕劇的劇目而出名。

sentences.english: Why may Fan Bing Bing and Tong Da Wei perform such TV?
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼范冰冰和佟大爲會出演這樣的電視呢？

sentences.english: Au Revoir Taipei》is the first movie performed by Amber Kuo.
sentences.chinese: 一頁臺北是郭采潔出演的第一部電影。

sentences.english: So now they are looking at four relatively unknown stars.
sentences.chinese: 拍攝方會找四位相對不知名的演員出演。

sentences.english: Does he want you in this play only because you are so pretty?
sentences.chinese: 只是因爲你長的好看他才讓你出演這個話劇嗎？

sentences.english: Things like money, role-playing and appearance still grab my interest.
sentences.chinese: 我對於金錢，角色出演與外表的內容很感興趣。

sentences.english: While Brad Pitt who act in Inglourious Basterds ranks at third.
sentences.chinese: 出演《無恥混蛋》的布拉德皮特位居第三。

sentences.english: In 1999, Seagal turned to producing with Prince of Central Park.
sentences.chinese: 1999年，西格爾出演了《中央公園的王子》。

sentences.english: Lea Michele as Rachel Berry on FOX's Glee.
sentences.chinese: 麗亞米雪兒在《歡樂合唱團》裏出演的雷切爾貝瑞。

sentences.english: Her father came to watch her once as Miss Bicentennial.
sentences.chinese: 她出演雙百年女郎時她父親來觀看過一次。

sentences.english: Would you be open to guest-starring on "The Vampire Diaries"?
sentences.chinese: 你會客串出演“吸血鬼日記嗎”？
在劇中，他出演一位船工。

sentences.english: Have you ever think about performing in Chinese drama?
sentences.chinese: 有考慮來中國出演影視劇嗎？

sentences.english: Both have done serious drama and comedy.
sentences.chinese: 兩人都曾出演過正劇和喜劇。

sentences.english: He was honoured for Arthur and died last year aged 96.
sentences.chinese: 他因出演《亞瑟王》而獲獎，去年謝世，享年96歲。

sentences.english: Li Shaohong, the director of the series, has yet to decide on the actress to play the role of grown-up Lin Daiyu.
sentences.chinese: 目前，導演李少紅還沒有確定由誰來出演成年林黛玉。

definition: to act the leading role (in a movie or a play)/to star/lead actor
to develop/to evolve/to practice/to perform/to play/to act
theatrical work (play, opera, TV series etc)/dramatic (change, increase etc)/acute/severe
